Name: View Profile Page
Description: Open profile page and verify user details render
Prerequisites: User navigates to Profile page
Expected Output: Profile fields display current user data; avatar shown if set

Name: Edit Basic Details Update Name
Description: Change first name and last name and save
Prerequisites: Profile page loaded with editable name fields
Expected Output: Name updates persist and display in profile header and other UI areas

Name: Edit Contact Details Update Phone
Description: Update phone number with valid format and save
Prerequisites: Profile page loaded with phone field
Expected Output: Phone saved and displayed in international format; confirmation shown

Name: Edit Contact Details Invalid Phone
Description: Enter malformed phone number and attempt save
Prerequisites: Profile page loaded with phone field
Expected Output: Client-side validation blocks save; shows validation error message

Name: Change Email With Verification
Description: Update email address and verify verification email sent
Prerequisites: Profile page loaded with email field; email service available
Expected Output: System sends verification email; profile shows pending verification state until confirmed

Name: Change Email Invalid Format
Description: Enter invalid email string and save
Prerequisites: Profile page loaded with email field
Expected Output: Client-side validation prevents save; shows invalid email error

Name: Change Password Success
Description: Change password using current password and new strong password
Prerequisites: Profile page with change password form; current password known
Expected Output: Password updated; user can authenticate with new password; success message shown
Actual Output: test_PM007: password does not update or reloads page

Name: Change Password Weak Password
Description: Attempt to set weak password that fails policy
Prerequisites: Profile page with change password form
Expected Output: Client-side and server-side reject weak password; shows strength requirements

Name: Avatar Upload Valid Image
Description: Upload profile picture within allowed size and format and save
Prerequisites: Profile page with avatar upload control; image file ready
Expected Output: Avatar displayed; image stored; thumbnail generated; success message shown

Name: Avatar Upload Oversize
Description: Upload image exceeding size limit
Prerequisites: Profile page with avatar upload control
Expected Output: Upload rejected; clear error message about size limit; no change to existing avatar

Name: Avatar Upload Invalid Format
Description: Upload non-image file or unsupported format
Prerequisites: Profile page with avatar upload control
Expected Output: Upload rejected; shows supported formats message; no avatar change

Name: Remove Avatar
Description: Remove existing profile picture and save
Prerequisites: Profile page with existing avatar
Expected Output: Avatar removed; default placeholder shown; server record updated

Name: Edit Doctor Specialization
Description: Doctor updates specialty field and save
Prerequisites: Profile page for doctor with specialty field
Expected Output: Specialty updated and reflected in doctor directory and profile

Name: Add Professional Certifications
Description: Upload certification documents to profile and save
Prerequisites: Profile page with attachments control; cert files ready
Expected Output: Attachments uploaded and linked to profile; visible in certifications list

Name: Attachment Size Limit Enforcement
Description: Attach certification exceeding size limit
Prerequisites: Profile page with attachments control
Expected Output: Upload rejected with clear error; attachment not stored

Name: Privacy Settings Toggle
Description: Change profile visibility/privacy settings and save
Prerequisites: Profile page with privacy toggles
Expected Output: Settings saved; profile visibility updated accordingly in public views

Name: Notification Preferences Update
Description: Change email and in-app notification preferences and save
Prerequisites: Profile page with notification settings
Expected Output: Preferences saved; notifications follow new preferences

Name: Localization Preference Change
Description: Switch language preference to Sinhala and save
Prerequisites: Profile page with language selector
Expected Output: UI language switches to Sinhala; date/time formats localized

Name: Timezone Preference Change
Description: Change timezone preference and save
Prerequisites: Profile page with timezone selector
Expected Output: Displayed appointment times and timestamps adjust to selected timezone

Name: Cancel Edits Revert
Description: Make edits then click Cancel and verify no changes persist
Prerequisites: Profile page with unsaved edits
Expected Output: Edits discarded; profile shows original saved values

Name: Concurrent Profile Edits Conflict
Description: Simulate two sessions editing same profile and saving conflicting changes
Prerequisites: Two active sessions on same account
Expected Output: System detects conflict; shows warning or last-writer-wins policy; audit log records both attempts

Name: Empty Required Field Validation
Description: Clear a required field e.g. last name and attempt save
Prerequisites: Profile page with required fields
Expected Output: Client-side validation prevents save; shows required field error

Name: Long Bio Field Performance
Description: Enter very large biography text and save
Prerequisites: Profile page with bio textarea; large content pasted
Expected Output: UI remains responsive; bio saved and displayed; no truncation or corruption

Name: XSS Sanitization in Profile Fields
Description: Enter script tags or HTML in free text fields and save
Prerequisites: Profile page with free text fields
Expected Output: Input sanitized; stored content rendered safely as plain text; no script execution

Name: Profile Change Audit Log Entry
Description: Update multiple profile fields and verify audit log entry created
Prerequisites: Profile page with change history enabled
Expected Output: Audit log contains entry with user id changed fields timestamp and previous values

Name: Profile URL Share Reproduction
Description: Copy profile share URL and open in new session to verify view
Prerequisites: Profile has public share URL enabled
Expected Output: Visiting URL reproduces same public profile view respecting privacy settings

Name: Phone Number International Formats
Description: Save phone numbers in different country formats and verify normalization
Prerequisites: Profile page with phone field
Expected Output: Phone normalized and stored in E.164 format; displayed appropriately

Name: Role-Based Field Visibility
Description: Verify doctor-only fields hidden for patient accounts and visible for doctors
Prerequisites: Profile page for patient and doctor accounts
Expected Output: Doctor-only fields hidden for patient; visible and editable for doctor

Name: Accessibility Keyboard Navigation
Description: Navigate and edit profile using keyboard only
Prerequisites: Profile page loaded
Expected Output: All controls reachable and operable via keyboard; save and cancel accessible; screen reader labels present

Name: Delete Account Soft Delete
Description: Trigger account deletion and verify soft delete behavior
Prerequisites: Profile page with delete account control
Expected Output: Account marked soft-deleted; user cannot log in; data retained per retention policy; audit log entry created
